name: WORLD CUP INU
description: World Cup Inu is the first token on ETH to support the World Cup! Where holders can participate and bet amongst each other! Can participate in Lottery and win the pool. WCI is one of a kind betting portal for web3.0 betting. Experience the thrill and excitement of real-time World Cup betting. Bet with your friends, families, and thousands of defi anons. WCI is developing a web3 betting app where users can bet on their fav team via eth directly using metamask. And those funds will stay in an intelligent contract, and using Oracle will get the data and declare a winner, and the winning amount will be Transferred. With a 10% tax on all the bets which will be used for a lottery pool (where all fans can participate and have a chance to win the lottery pool)
